titles.title: Recognizing 75 Texas World War II veterans visiting Washington, D.C., on September 27, 2010, to visit the memorials built in their honor.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary: 9/28/2010--Introduced. Honors the 75 World War II veterans visiting Washington, D.C., from Texas on September 27, 2010, for their service and dedication, and wishes them a memorable visit to Washington.
